comment.body:
> [nofish](#comment_154_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): To add it to your existing blog copy alloy-editor, css, js directories and index.html file from data/1BLogC9LN4oPDcruNz3qo1ysa133E9AGg8/ to data/[Yoursiteaddress]/

Sorry, I just can't make it work... I copied the mentioned files but there's no change. Should I do something else after doing so...?

> [nofish](#comment_159_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): its possible that you have to wait 5-10 minute for browser cache, but then it should work

Sorry, my bad. I failed to copy css and js folders. It's working now. 
Thanks for you awesome work!

Great news. I hope you can tell us more about all that very soon.
Keep up the great work.
Um... I try to mute a user un ZeroMe but I don't see anything happening. Maybe it's me, I think I should refresh my ZN install...

> [nofish](#comment_173_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): I just did a bugfix, please update and try again.

Working like a charm. Best update so far. Thank you very much sir. Level up!
